title: Meta, Kroger, Centene, L3Harris make Bernstein's top stock 12 picks (META)
description: Bernstein has picked Meta (META), Hewlett Packard (HPE), Kroger (KR), Centene (CNC), American Express (AXP) and L3Harris (LHX) as six of their top 12 stock picks. Read more here.

title: The Metaverse Is Still the Next Big Thing, Meta Insists
